# Figma MCP

This skill enables querying Figma designs for UI components, styles, design tokens, and assets. Use when asked to analyze existing Figma files, extract design information, get component details, or reference UI designs for implementation in the Bono Pay dashboard or other client applications.

## Usage Examples
- "Get the color palette from Figma file X"
- "Extract button component styles from Figma"
- "Analyze the layout of the dashboard screen in Figma"
- "Get design tokens for typography and spacing"

## Capabilities
- Query Figma files by ID or URL
- Extract components, styles, and design tokens
- Get layout information and measurements
- Reference UI designs for development

Note: Requires Figma access token and file permissions.
